name: BehavioralDesignCue
summary: An implementation for labeling Behavioral Design Cues for App Opens. Cues like notifications, shortcuts, and deep links are categorized into synthetic, internal, and external cues.
description: An implementation for labeling Behavioral Design Cues for App Opens. Cues like notifications, shortcuts, and deep links are categorized into synthetic, internal, and external cues. The eBook Digital Behavioral Design (https://www.boundless.ai/ebook/) goes into more detail on what cues are and how they affect users.
